alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 20 at 1:36PM MDT until March 21 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CDT /11 PM MDT/ MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, Reeves County Plains and Davis Mountains Foothills, and Eastern Culberson County. * WHEN...From 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ Monday to midnight CDT /11 PM MDT/ Monday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust may reduce visibility and make travel difficult.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
